conversations.description: User uploads a SaaS subscription agreement to get plain‑language summaries of payment schedules, auto‑renewal terms, and termination rights, plus risk flags for hidden fees.
Freelancer submits a freelance graphic‑design contract to see obligations on deliverables, ownership of artwork, and any indemnity clauses that might be unfair.
Startup founder provides a standard NDA to verify confidentiality obligations, duration, and whether any overly broad exclusions could expose trade secrets.
Employee uploads an employment agreement to understand salary, benefits, non‑compete scope, and any arbitration clauses that limit legal recourse.
Landlord shares a residential lease to get a summary of rent, security deposit, pet policies, and flags for unusually high penalty fees for early termination.
Small business owner uploads a loan agreement to see interest rate calculations, repayment schedule, default triggers, and risky acceleration provisions.
Two entrepreneurs provide a partnership agreement to clarify profit sharing, decision‑making authority, and exit mechanisms, with alerts on vague dissolution terms.
M&A analyst uploads a merger term sheet to extract key closing conditions, representations, warranties, and identify any indemnity caps that are unusually low.
Procurement manager submits a vendor services contract to get a breakdown of service levels, liability limits, and notice periods for contract termination.
Event planner uploads a venue contract to summarize usage times, cancellation fees, insurance requirements, and flags for exclusive catering clauses.
Software company provides a licensing agreement to translate usage rights, royalty calculations, audit rights, and highlight any jurisdiction clauses that may be unfavorable.
Inventor uploads an IP assignment agreement to confirm transfer of ownership, moral rights waiver, and risk flags for residual usage rights retained by the assignor.
Data analyst provides a data‑processing agreement to summarize GDPR obligations, data breach notifications, and identify any overly broad data‑retention terms.
Executive reviews a non‑compete clause from a previous contract to see geographic scope, duration, and whether it is enforceable under local law.
IT manager uploads a service‑level agreement (SLA) to receive plain‑language uptime guarantees, credit formulas, and warnings about penalty exclusions.
Construction firm submits a building contract to extract milestones, change‑order procedures, liquidated damages, and risk flags for payment hold‑backs.
Franchisee uploads a franchise agreement to understand royalties, territory exclusivity, training obligations, and any hidden renewal fees.
Social media influencer provides a brand‑collaboration contract to clarify content rights, exclusivity periods, payment schedule, and risky indemnity clauses.
Purchaser shares a purchase order with terms to see delivery obligations, inspection rights, warranty periods, and alerts for limitation of liability.
Joint venture partners upload their JV agreement to get summaries of capital contributions, profit split, governance, and red flags for exit penalties.
Shareholder uploads a shareholders' agreement to summarize voting rights, tag‑along/drag‑along provisions, and risk flags for forced buy‑outs.
Policyholder provides an insurance policy document to extract coverage limits, deductibles, exclusions, and warnings about claim‑submission deadlines.
Parties to a settlement agreement upload the document to see settlement amount, release language, confidentiality obligations, and any lingering enforcement clauses.
Company receives a termination notice and uploads it to confirm notice period, cure rights, and any penalties for early termination.
Contract manager uploads an amendment to an existing service contract to see what clauses were changed, added, or removed, with risk flags for reduced protections.
Startup founder provides an escrow agreement to understand fund release conditions, escrow agent duties, and potential disputes over trigger events.
Music producer uploads a music‑licensing agreement to get plain‑language summaries of royalty rates, territory, duration, and alerts for exclusive rights clauses.
Open‑source contributor shares a contribution agreement to verify grant of license, patent rights, and any clauses that could limit future use.
Homebuyer uploads a real‑estate purchase agreement to summarize purchase price, inspection contingencies, financing clauses, and risky default penalties.
Company uploads an equipment lease contract to break down lease term, maintenance responsibilities, early‑termination fees, and liability for equipment loss.
Consultant provides a consulting retainer agreement to see scope of services, billing rates, confidentiality, and any restrictive covenant clauses.
Marketing agency uploads a marketing services agreement to extract deliverables, performance metrics, intellectual‑property ownership, and risk of non‑payment clauses.
Affiliate partner shares an affiliate agreement to clarify commission structure, tracking requirements, termination triggers, and any non‑compete restrictions.
Crowdfunder uploads a crowdfunding campaign terms document to summarize fund disbursement schedule, refund policies, and flags for platform‑ownership of ideas.
Community manager provides community‑guidelines agreement to get a plain‑language overview of user conduct rules, moderation powers, and liability limitations.
Parent uploads a consent form for a school trip to understand liability waivers, medical authorization, and any indemnification language.
Gym member uploads a membership agreement to see membership fees, cancellation policy, liability waiver, and risky clauses about automatic renewals.
Traveler shares a travel‑itinerary terms PDF to get summaries of cancellation fees, force‑majeure provisions, and alerts for waiver of provider liability.
Pet owner uploads a pet‑care services contract to break down feeding duties, emergency care consent, insurance coverage, and risk flags for unlimited liability.
Bride uploads a wedding‑vendor contract to summarize service dates, deposit schedule, cancellation penalties, and any exclusive vendor clauses.
E‑commerce merchant provides terms of service to get a plain‑language summary of user obligations, dispute resolution, and flags for unfair arbitration clauses.
App developer uploads an app‑store developer agreement to see revenue‑share percentages, update obligations, and risky termination rights.
API consumer provides an API usage policy to summarize rate limits, data ownership, indemnification, and alerts for broad liability exclusions.
Charity uploads a donation agreement to understand donor rights, use‑of‑funds restrictions, reporting requirements, and any indemnity language.
Tech startup shares a SaaS data‑backup agreement to get a summary of backup frequency, data recovery SLA, and risk flags for data loss penalties.
Remote employee uploads a remote‑work policy to see equipment provision, security obligations, expense reimbursement, and any jurisdiction‑choice clauses.
Company provides a cybersecurity services contract to summarize threat‑monitoring scope, incident‑response timelines, and liability caps for breach damages.
Vendor uploads a procurement contract for office supplies to extract delivery terms, price escalation clauses, warranty, and risk of unilateral price changes.
Land developer uploads a land‑use agreement to get summaries of zoning restrictions, development milestones, and flags for penalty provisions.
Freelance writer provides a content‑creation agreement to see ownership of drafts, revision limits, payment schedule, and risky indemnity for third‑party claims.
Healthcare provider uploads a patient‑consent form to break down treatment permissions, data sharing, and any broad release of liability language.
Education platform shares a student‑enrollment agreement to understand tuition fees, refund policy, code of conduct, and flags for arbitration clauses.
Non‑profit uploads a volunteer‑service agreement to summarize duties, confidentiality, insurance coverage, and any indemnification for volunteer actions.
Startup founder uploads a seed‑investment term sheet to get a plain‑language overview of valuation, equity percentage, pro‑rata rights, and risky liquidation preferences.
Company uploads a joint‑research agreement to summarize IP ownership of results, publication rights, funding obligations, and flags for exclusivity clauses.
